name: koa-better-ratelimit
description: Better, smaller, faster. KoaJS requests rate limiter middleware, with in-memory store/db.

scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test node --harmony-generators node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --require should
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test node --harmony-generators node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --require should
